column4: hey guys.. i have a weird problem, i'm trying to deactivate the pc beep, but sudo rmmod pcspkr gives me "ERROR: Module pcspkr does not exist in /proc/modules "
i forgot to mention, when i try hitting backspace in the terminals it's fine, it doesn't beep
but when i do that in pidgin it does
setterm doesn't seem to have any effect
put that on your ~/.profile together with setterm -bfreq 0
and you could also try for pidgin "xset b"
did you also tried changing the pcspeaker volume on alsamixer?
i have no slider for that
there's a "Beep" slider but it's on 0
I don't know what else to tell you... are you sure is pcspkr beep and not some sound configuration on pidgin ?
this happens on other windows too
my "beep" is mutted on alsamixer... try that too
and why didn't i think of that? lol
